aththatama ee kalaye guruwaru guti gasa ho apiwa mehema thanakata genapu eka gana mathakweddi dannam mara sathutak atha.nathnam ada api me inna thanakawath natha.ee kale me kunuharupen banapu katawal walinma dan hoda kiyanne guru wruththiye thiyana sadhu balen wenna oona.prayimariye idan wali walata gihin ekekge bij** payin gahapu ekakata mage oluwa biththiye happala mawa kabad ekaka dala wahapu karunarathna prinsipal sar wagema (ethuma samadanaye sathapenna oona.anna sarla) mata guti bata dila,awawada dila mawa hoda magata gaththu guruuthuman hamoma nirogiwa,nidukin, inna thanaka sapen sathutin inna oona kiyala man mage hitha pathulenma prarthana karanawa.....

okthombar mase patan gaththe ma niyama widiyata..dewani sathiye muladima athage siya nathi wuna...hewwata hambu wenne nathi wendama nathi wuna...siya 100k gahayi kiyala hithuwata 98 awut wuna....ra wechchi sin eka hinda pahuwenida dawal wela rupe ee paththe giye poddak oluwa dala opis gihin ma nayita gahanda enawa kiyala hithagena...athal eke yana gaman kalpana kara kara giye neskafe thibunoth ela kiyala....

ewita swaminwahansege thejasa mulu sabhawata penuneya. 20 swaminwahanse mosesta saha aaronta kathakota: 21 ma wisin me sabhawa kshanayakin winasha karana pinisa oba sama mowun atharen wenwannayi kiseka. 22 ewita owhu muhunin wati: aho, dewiyanwahansa, mansaya wu siyallange aathmawala dewiyanwahansa, eka manushyayek pawkarana wita oba mulu sabhawa kerehi udahaswanasekdayi kiwoya. 23 swaminwahanse mosesta kathakota: 24 kora ha dathangeda abiramgeda wasasthanaya langin ahakwa yanna kiya sabhawata kiyannayi kiseka. 25 ewita moses nagita dathan ha abiram langata giyeya; ishrayelwarunge wadimahalloda ohu passe giyoya. 26 ewita ohu sabhawata kathakara: me dushta manushyayange siyalu papawalin winasha nowena pinisa owunge kisideyakata athanogasa owunge kudaram wethin ahak wennayi kiweya. 27 ese owhu hama athinma korageda dathangeda abiramgeda wasasthanaya langin ahakwa giyoya.
